abstract: The Apple Watch will be sold in just nine countries and only through its own channels, entering the world in a different manner from that of the iPhone.
snippet: The Apple Watch will be sold in just nine countries and only through its own channels, entering the world in a different manner from that of the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Apple has scrapped its usual routine for releasing products with its new device, the Apple Watch. The company is instead taking a page from the playbook of another industry: luxury goods makers.

headline.main: Changing Tactics, Apple Promotes Watch as a Luxury Item
headline.print_headline: Changing Strategy, Apple Promotes Its New Watch as a Luxury Item
